reviews.review_msg: Whoa, i had him for 261 and 235.  He marks rediculously hard, and the work load is CRAZY! lets just say i shed a tear of stress during both these classes. DONT TAKE THEM

Amazing professor, you can really tell she is passionate about what she does and that she is very intelligent. Her Harvard PhD in Ai science says it all tbh. Her readings though long tie in very well to her lectures and she is very organized and excited to get to know students in small lectures. The TA was also amazing but a tough grader.

Stephanie is an amazing professor. The course content was a bit dry in nature, but she made it as interesting and relevant as possible. All assignments had clear outlines; however, she does expect quite a bit of reflection and application of course materials to get an A or above.
